attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Determines the style, can be "info", "warning", or "error". Default is "info"

attributes.name: corner
attributes.description: Determines if banner sets position at upper right corner or not.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Determines the style, can be "info", "warning", or "error". Default is "info"

properties.name: corner
properties.description: Determines if banner sets position at upper right corner or not.

slots.name: content
slots.description: Secondary message of the banner. Used to provide a description.
